content.query:
DECLARE @retry INT;
SET @retry = 1;

WHILE (@retry <= 3)
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRY
        -- Your T-SQL code here
        BREAK; -- If successful, break the loop
    END TRY
    BEGIN CATCH
        -- Error handling code
        PRINT 'Attempt ' + CAST(@retry AS VARCHAR) + ': An error occurred: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE();
        SET @retry = @retry + 1; -- Increment the retry count
    END CATCH
END
